persons: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
subject: Doping (Sports)
Horse Racing
Steroids
lead_paragraph: A racehorse owned by Queen Elizabeth II was stripped of a second-place finish in this year’s prestigious Gold Cup after testing positive for the banned painkiller morphine.
snippet: A racehorse owned by Queen Elizabeth II was stripped of a second-place finish in this year’s prestigious Gold Cup after testing positive for the banned painkiller morphine.
